• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated maps.
  • Real-time sync via MQTT broker for multiplayer gameplay.
  • Progressive upgrades including drill tiers, cargo capacity, and special items like TNT and teleporters.
  • Save system with local IndexedDB storage and optional cloud sync via Puter.
  • Mobile controls with touch support and responsive UI layouts.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure where players dig deep to extract ores, upgrade equipment, and build structures. The game features real-time multiplayer via MQTT, procedural world generation, and persistent saves with cloud sync options. Players can craft items, teleport between stations, and compete on leaderboards while exploring an infinite underground world.
